user_query: I want to plan a family trip to Prague and explore the Prague Stock Exchange. Can you provide me with the current version and build date of the stock exchange API? Also, fetch the list of days when the stock exchange operates to help me plan our visit. Additionally, recommend some trending stocks in today's market and suggest some technology stocks with high revenue and earnings growth.

TaskList.description: Fetch the current version and build date of the stock exchange API.
Retrieve the operational days of the Prague Stock Exchange.
Get the list of trending stocks in today's market.
Fetch the technology stocks with high revenue and earnings growth.
Plan the family trip itinerary based on the operational days of the stock exchange and the stock recommendations.
